actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

official_title: To deem the S/V Zodiac to be less than 100 gross tons, so as to allow the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to inspect that vessel under regulations permitting wooden hulled ships to carry passengers.

summary.text: Deems a specified vessel to be less than a specified weight and provides for inspection of the vessel under certain regulations. Sets forth requirements regarding certification of the vessel.

titles.title: To deem the S/V Zodiac to be less than 100 gross tons, so as to allow the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to inspect that vessel under regulations permitting wooden hulled ships to carry passengers.
